Please ensure all permissions are granted and battery optimization is disabled.
Please ensure Telegram Bot secret key and Telegram User ID are correct.
Please ensure that automatic permission management turned OFF in Application settings. Check something like \"Manage app if unused\" and turn it off. Otherwise the App can work unstable.

This application is intended to forward incoming SMS messages to a Telegram bot. 

It may be useful to receive SMS messages from a rarely used sim-card which you don't want to keep with you all the time. 

You can install it on an unused device at home, connected to the internet. 

To setup correctly you need to set Telegram User ID (may be acquired via a special bot) and your Bot ID (you need to create it via @BotFather) and copy Bot's secret key to a corresponding field. 

You should also send any message first to a bot from your Telegram account because bots can not send messages to users first. 

To verify everything is set up correctly check that both "Test" buttons are sending something to your Telegram account via Bot. 

This app's source code is published under open-source license, so you can verify it does not do anything else than described above.
